content.rendered:
[mk_page_section layout_structure=”half_left” bg_image=”https://jdstrata.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/emergency-plumbing.jpg” video_color_mask=”#ffffff” video_opacity=”0.8″ top_shadow=”true”][vc_column][mk_padding_divider size=”20″][vc_row_inner is_fullwidth_content=”false”][vc_column_inner][mk_fancy_title color=”#cfd628″ size=”24″ font_weight=”400″ txt_transform=”uppercase” margin_top=”40″ margin_bottom=”40″ font_family=”none” responsive_align=”left” el_class=”line-green”]After hours emergency?[/mk_fancy_title][mk_fancy_title color=”#524a48″ size=”20″ line_height=”150″ font_weight=”400″ margin_top=”40″ margin_bottom=”40″ font_family=”none” responsive_align=”left”]As your Strata Manager, we provide an after-hours telephone number to use only in the event of an emergency.

To obtain this number, please call our office on 9335 5877 after office hours and wait for the notice on our answering machine.

This mobile number will direct you to one of our rostered Strata Managers.

Please note that after-hours rates will apply.[/mk_fancy_title][mk_fancy_title color=”#dd3333″ size=”20″ line_height=”150″ font_weight=”400″ txt_transform=”uppercase” margin_top=”40″ margin_bottom=”40″ font_family=”none” responsive_align=”left”]In the event of a fire – Please call 000 and leave property immediately.[/mk_fancy_title][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][mk_padding_divider][/vc_column][/mk_page_section][mk_page_section bg_image=”https://jdstrata.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/jdss-background-green.jpg” attachment=”fixed” video_color_mask=”#cfd628″ video_opacity=”0.5″ top_shadow=”true” sidebar=”sidebar-1″][vc_column][mk_padding_divider][mk_fancy_title color=”#524a48″ size=”24″ font_weight=”400″ txt_transform=”uppercase” margin_top=”40″ margin_bottom=”40″ font_family=”none” align=”center” responsive_align=”left” el_class=”line-grey”]What do we consider an emergency?[/mk_fancy_title][mk_padding_divider][vc_row_inner is_fullwidth_content=”false”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][mk_custom_list icon_color=”#524a48″]

  • Burst water services and flooding
  • Security Gates – Access to and from property is obstructed in the event of a fire
  • Blocked sewerage
  • Electrical faults causing damage or endangering lives
  • Lift Faults (for apartment buildings)
  • Damage caused by storms, fire or flood
  • Smashed glass caused by accident and/or vandalism
[/mk_custom_list][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][mk_fancy_title color=”#524a48″ size=”18″ line_height=”150″ font_weight=”400″ margin_bottom=”0″ font_family=”none” responsive_align=”left”]The following may not be considered an emergency
and will be attended to during office hours:[/mk_fancy_title][mk_custom_list icon_color=”#524a48″]
  • Leaking taps
  • Faulty TV reception-antenna problems
  • Faulty security gate where access to and from the property is not impeded
  • Loss of internet connection
  • Vandalism, Theft, Trespassing – Please contact your local police station
  • Reticulation Issues
[/mk_custom_list][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][mk_padding_divider][/vc_column][/mk_page_section][mk_page_section bg_color=”#ffffff” video_color_mask=”#ffffff” video_opacity=”0.3″ sidebar=”sidebar-1″][vc_column][mk_padding_divider size=”60″][vc_row_inner is_fullwidth_content=”false”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][mk_image src=”https://jdstrata.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/phone.jpg” image_size=”full”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][mk_fancy_title color=”#524a48″ size=”18″ line_height=”150″ font_weight=”400″ margin_bottom=”0″ font_family=”Roboto” font_type=”google” responsive_align=”left”]Before calling out your own contractor, it is advisable to call our emergency line first to ensure that the contractor who attends is familiar with your property and is able to determine whether or not it is a strata issue.

Please note that where it is not a strata issue, you or the owner of your property may be liable for any call-out fees that are incurred.[/mk_fancy_title][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][mk_padding_divider size=”60″][/vc_column][/mk_page_section]

To obtain this number, please call our office on 9335 […]
